messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Quitting sports/list party
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 16/08/2003 19:26:27 Pacific Daylight Time, HMSL2@aol.com ... Hey Laura, I plan to run wild on the list while they are gone, telling jokes
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 16/08/2003 19:26:27 Pacific Daylight Time, HMSL2@...
writes:


> Laura
> Oh my gosh I just realized when you all are at the conference the list will
> be wicked slow, bummer...
>

Hey Laura, I plan to run wild on the list while they are gone, telling jokes
and eating chocolate and starting cliques. If I can't go to the conference I
will have some virtual fun!!(of course that was a joke)

By the way, that football program sounds really awful. I wouldn't want to be
there either.
Nancy in BC, wishing I was going to SC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
